__e: When I meet really religious people, we are friends at once... no matter what name we give to the divine will that made us and moves us.
Isn't it just the most divine place you ever did see?
This great, godly miracle of radio really gives me the opportunity to speak to you on the air.
My divine right to command over life and death.
To serve, to serve the divine idea is the purpose... of the freedom for which this folk has been chosen.
This is THE DIVINE RIGHT OF ALL.
You possess no radio, neither the divine nor the human.
But you can't escape God's judgment and I think.... you're still guilty.
Nevertheless, we must do everything we can to save the thing that divine right and history have placed on his head.
Once we lived in the image of the creator according to the divine plan in a perfect and unchanging world created and functioning with a purpose you could clearly identify any time you read the Bible.
Discover the Divine calling on your life and create a God inspired project for your life.
Maybe it's a sign from God that I should reconsider.
Be strong divine, to face all your enemies.
My Divine Plan to save humanity has already begun.
